verses.verse: When the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> thee into the <S%H776>land<s%> whither thou <S%H935>goest<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, and hath cast <S%H5394>out<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, and the <S%H1622>Girgashites<s%>, and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%>, and the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H7227>greater<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> than thou;

And when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; thou shalt <S%H5221>smite<s%> them, and <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroy<s%> them; thou shalt <S%H3772>make<s%> no <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them, nor shew <S%H2603>mercy<s%> unto them:

Neither shalt thou make <S%H2859>marriages<s%> with them; thy <S%H1323>daughter<s%> thou shalt not <S%H5414>give<s%> unto his <S%H1121>son<s%>, nor his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> shalt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> unto thy <S%H1121>son<s%>.

For they will turn <S%H5493>away<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> me, that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>: so will the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against you, and <S%H8045>destroy<s%> thee <S%H4118>suddenly<s%>.

But thus shall ye <S%H6213>deal<s%> with them; ye shall <S%H5422>destroy<s%> their <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and break <S%H7665>down<s%> their <S%H4676>images<s%>, and cut <S%H1438>down<s%> their <S%H842>groves<s%>, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their graven <S%H6456>images<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

For thou art an <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> thee to be a <S%H5459>special<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto himself, above all <S%H5971>people<s%> that are upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> did not set his <S%H2836>love<s%> upon you, nor <S%H977>choose<s%> you, because ye were <S%H7230>more<s%> in number than any <S%H5971>people<s%>; for ye were the <S%H4592>fewest<s%> of all <S%H5971>people<s%>:

But because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H160>loved<s%> you, and because he would <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%> which he had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> you out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondmen<s%>, from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

<S%H3045>Know<s%> therefore that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, he is <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, which <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy<s%> with them that <S%H157>love<s%> him and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> to a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>;

And <S%H7999>repayeth<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> him to their <S%H6440>face<s%>, to <S%H6>destroy<s%> them: he will not be <S%H309>slack<s%> to him that <S%H8130>hateth<s%> him, he will <S%H7999>repay<s%> him to his <S%H6440>face<s%>.

Thou shalt therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and the <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> them.

Â¶ Wherefore it shall come to pass, <S%H6118>if<s%> ye <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to these <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> them, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> unto thee the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and the <S%H2617>mercy<s%> which he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>:

And he will <S%H157>love<s%> thee, and <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> thee: he will also <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H990>womb<s%>, and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H127>land<s%>, thy <S%H1715>corn<s%>, and thy <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and thine <S%H3323>oil<s%>, the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of thy <S%H504>kine<s%>, and the <S%H6251>flocks<s%> of thy <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, in the <S%H127>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> thee.
Thou shalt be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> above all <S%H5971>people<s%>: there shall not be <S%H6135>male<s%> or female <S%H6135>barren<s%> among you, or among your <S%H929>cattle<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will take <S%H5493>away<s%> from thee all <S%H2483>sickness<s%>, and will <S%H7760>put<s%> none of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4064>diseases<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, which thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%>, upon thee; but will <S%H5414>lay<s%> them upon all them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee.

And thou shalt <S%H398>consume<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> thee; thine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall have no <S%H2347>pity<s%> upon them: neither shalt thou <S%H5647>serve<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%>; for that will be a <S%H4170>snare<s%> unto thee.
If thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> in thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>, These <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H7227>more<s%> than I; <S%H349>how<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> I <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> them?

Thou shalt not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of them: but shalt <S%H2142>well<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> what the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and unto all <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>;

The <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4531>temptations<s%> which thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%>, and the <S%H226>signs<s%>, and the <S%H4159>wonders<s%>, and the <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and the stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>, whereby the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> brought thee <S%H3318>out<s%>: so shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of whom thou art <S%H3373%H6440>afraid<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H6880>hornet<s%> among them, until they that are <S%H7604>left<s%>, and <S%H5641>hide<s%> themselves <S%H6440>from<s%> thee, be <S%H6>destroyed<s%>.

Thou shalt not be <S%H6206>affrighted<s%> <S%H6440>at<s%> them: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H7130>among<s%> you, a <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will put <S%H5394>out<s%> <S%H411>those<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee by <S%H4592>little<s%> and <S%H4592>little<s%>: thou <S%H3201>mayest<s%> not <S%H3615>consume<s%> them at <S%H4118>once<s%>, lest the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H7235>increase<s%> upon thee.

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them unto <S%H6440>thee<s%>, and shall <S%H1949>destroy<s%> them with a <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H4103>destruction<s%>, until they be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> their <S%H4428>kings<s%> into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H6>destroy<s%> their <S%H8034>name<s%> from under <S%H8064>heaven<s%>: there shall no <S%H376>man<s%> be able to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, until thou have <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them.

The graven <S%H6456>images<s%> of their <S%H430>gods<s%> shall ye <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>: thou shalt not <S%H2530>desire<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> or <S%H2091>gold<s%> that is on them, nor <S%H3947>take<s%> it unto thee, lest thou be <S%H3369>snared<s%> therein: for it is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.

Neither shalt thou <S%H935>bring<s%> an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> into thine <S%H1004>house<s%>, lest thou be a cursed <S%H2764>thing<s%> like it: but thou shalt <S%H8262>utterly<s%> <S%H8262>detest<s%> it, and thou shalt <S%H8581>utterly<s%> <S%H8581>abhor<s%> it; for it is a cursed <S%H2764>thing<s%>.
